# [FEAT] Content Blocks

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `priority:medium`

## Description
Implement reusable content blocks that can be shared across multiple articles for consistent information management.

## Requirements

### Content Blocks
- Create reusable content snippets
- Rich text formatting
- Images and media support
- Code snippets
- Tables and lists

### Block Management
- Block library/repository
- Block categories
- Block search
- Block versioning
- Usage tracking (where used)

### Block Insertion
- Insert block into articles
- Block placeholder rendering
- Real-time updates across articles
- Block preview

### Block Updates
- Single edit updates all instances
- Update notifications
- Version history
- Rollback capability

### Use Cases
- Legal disclaimers
- Contact information
- Product specifications
- Standard procedures
- Warning messages

## Zendesk Reference
Content Blocks improve knowledge management by allowing users to make a single change that's then published across every page the block is linked to.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Create and manage blocks
- [ ] Insert blocks into articles
- [ ] Updates propagate everywhere
- [ ] Usage tracking works
- [ ] Version history available
